title: Chocolate Chip Cheesecake
author: Jon Preece
description: A delicious little something to satisfy any sweet tooth
instructions: To make almond flour, blend a bag of almonds in a food processor.
Transfer the blended almonds in to a bowl, add the cocoa powder and stevia.
Put the butter in the microwave for 60 seconds to melt it. Mix into the almond mixture and dish out to create the base.
In a food processor add the cream cheese and whipping cream and crumble in the dark chocolate.
Once whipped, use to cover the base. Add raspberries if desired.
Place in the fridge for an hour to set.
